attributes.action: A knighthood and national recognition for francis benali's amazing charity work
attributes.additional_details: Through his efforts francis has raised in excess of £ 820,000 for cancer research uk, this has been through a series of ultra - challenges the current one of which is 7 ironman triathlons in 7 days, he is an amazing man and a huge inspiration to so many people. He deserves to be honoured nationally.
attributes.background: Francis benali has been raising money for charities and cancer research uk for several years. He deserves recognition for his charity work and contributions to football. He also deserves recognition for his support of so many local organisations in southampton.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
